pullrequest.title: renaming instances of drc robot to atlas per issue #53

content.raw:
Wow, 750K line patch. I skimmed through it and don't see anything obviously wrong, but it's pretty much impossible to actually read.

In lieu of review, can you describe (or, better, post here) the steps you took to make the name change?
